channel.title: Item.cfg
channel.description:
Hi, I need help. This might sound like a noob question, so please don't flame.
[code]item = 4151 Abyssal_whip A_weapon_from_the_abyss. 651608.0013642381 651608.0013642381 850929.5918252946 0 82 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 82 0 [/code] I am confused when I am looking at an item.cfg file, i know what all of those values are for except these, [code][651608.0013642381 651608.0013642381 850929.5918252946[/code] I know they have something to do with shop, but I need to set the item ids for capes in the item.cfg but I dont know what to put for those parts to make it work.

item.title: Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

The first two numbers are the same, so I’m not sure how they differ within the other scripts, but they represent how much you can sell the item to the store for. The third number is how much you can buy that item for. It’s possible that I’m wrong, so correct me if I am.

Read full topic

item.title: Item.cfg
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

o it confuses me also but if i want to make say the whip 1.5m and it says stuff like [651608.0013642381 651608.0013642381 850929.5918252946 i just change the numbers to 1500000 i know thats not what you ment but i think this can help you under stand thoes numbers.

Read full topic

silabs, of course, but i know that is for cost of item, still dont understand how it works, theres like 3 things, and some different?

item.title: Item.cfg

item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

o nvm i see what your saying the [651608.0013642381 651608.0013642381 850929.5918252946
is how much the item costs.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2007, 01:02:57 AM[/size][hr][quote=“blakeblake, post:3, topic:141301”]i want to rename the items that are serverside to make the clientside capes work, but i dont know what those numbers are for, or what to put for the new one.[/quote] ooo so are you useing silia’s client? or your own?

Read full topic
